sourcesContent:
{{ product.name }}

Description: {{ product.description }}

> import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product', templateUrl: './product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product.component.css'] }) export class ProductComponent { products = products; share() { window.alert('The product has been shared!'); } onNotify() { window.alert('You will be notified when the product goes on sale'); } }
